GSD.description: The Zend_Xml_Security::scan in ZendXml before 1.0.1 and Zend Framework before 1.12.14, 2.x before 2.4.6, and 2.5.x before 2.5.2, when running under PHP-FPM in a threaded environment, allows remote attackers to bypass security checks and conduct XML external entity (XXE) and XML entity expansion (XEE) attacks via multibyte encoded characters.

description_data.value: The Zend_Xml_Security::scan in ZendXml before 1.0.1 and Zend Framework before 1.12.14, 2.x before 2.4.6, and 2.5.x before 2.5.2, when running under PHP-FPM in a threaded environment, allows remote attackers to bypass security checks and conduct XML external entity (XXE) and XML entity expansion (XEE) attacks via multibyte encoded characters.

reference_data.name: 20150813 Zend Framework <= 2.4.2 XML eXternal Entity Injection (XXE) on PHP FPM

advisories.affected_versions: All versions starting from 2.0.0 before 2.4.6, all versions starting from 2.5.0 before 2.5.2
advisories.description: There's a flow that allows remote attackers to bypass security checks and conduct XML external entity (XXE) and XML entity expansion (XEE) attacks via multibyte encoded characters. This only apply when running under PHP-FPM in a threaded environment.
advisories.not_impacted: All versions before 2.0.0-stable, all versions starting from 2.4.6 before 2.5.0, all versions starting from 2.5.2
advisories.title: XXE/XEE vulnerability via multibyte payloads

advisories.description: There's a flow that allows remote attackers to bypass security checks and conduct XML external entity (XXE) and XML entity expansion (XEE) attacks via multibyte encoded characters. This only apply when running under PHP-FPM in a threaded environment.
advisories.title: XXE/XEE vulnerability via multibyte payloads

advisories.description: The `Zend_Xml_Security::scan` in ZendXml and Zend Framework, when running under PHP-FPM in a threaded environment, allows remote attackers to bypass security checks and conduct XML external entity (XXE) and XML entity expansion (XEE) attacks via multibyte encoded characters.
advisories.not_impacted: All versions before 1.0.0, all versions starting from 1.0.1
advisories.title: Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference

description_data.value: The Zend_Xml_Security::scan in ZendXml before 1.0.1 and Zend Framework before 1.12.14, 2.x before 2.4.6, and 2.5.x before 2.5.2, when running under PHP-FPM in a threaded environment, allows remote attackers to bypass security checks and conduct XML external entity (XXE) and XML entity expansion (XEE) attacks via multibyte encoded characters.

reference_data.name: 20150813 Zend Framework <= 2.4.2 XML eXternal Entity Injection (XXE) on PHP FPM
